title: Tier Mobility’s buy of Fantasmo brings camera positioning tech in-house - TechCrunch
content: Tier Mobility’s buy of Fantasmo brings camera positioning tech in-house  TechCrunch
description: Shared micromobility company Tier Mobility said on Wednesday it has acquired Fantasmo, a U.S.-based computer vision-powered e-scooter parking startup whose tech Tier had been trialing in multiple cities in Europe. Tier will bring on all of Fantasmo’s 15 staff members and continue to invest in…
